title: DHS Secretary Kristi Noem Reveals 80,000 Americans Applied To Become ICE Agents
summary: DHS Secretary Kristi Noem Reveals 80,000 Americans Applied To Become ICE Agents Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem told Fox News' Lawrence Jones that Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) has received an overwhelming 80,000 applications for just 10,000 new jobs at the...
fullContent: DHS Secretary Kristi Noem Reveals 80,000 Americans Applied To Become ICE Agents Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem told Fox News' Lawrence Jones that Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) has received an overwhelming 80,000 applications for just 10,000 new jobs at the agency. "Our recruitment efforts to hire 10,000 new ICE officers has been extremely successful. Lawrence, as of today, we have over 80,000 applicants for those ten thousand positions already," Noem said. She continued, "People and patriots across this country that say we want to join. We want to help and be a part of this effort. It's overwhelming to see the amount of response in support that our ICE officers have gotten." ðŸš¨ HUGE! @Sec_Noem tells Fox Newsâ€™ @LawrenceBJones3 that ICE has received 80,000 applicants for the agencyâ€™s 10,000 new officer positions pic.twitter.com/ti2rY0uEYn â€” TV News Now (@TVNewsNow) August 6, 2025 Perhaps the financial incentives, such as $50,000 signing bonus and tens of thousands in student loan repayment, were enough to drive the surge in applications. These benefits are clearly outlined on ICE's official website. https://t.co/nZkBEj3GGi pic.twitter.com/N7cFpDhb7W â€” Homeland Security (@DHSgov) August 5, 2025 Text from the website states: "America has been invaded by criminals and predators. We need YOU to get them out. You do not need an undergraduate degree." Democrats are going insane about ICE's messaging to bolster its forces - because just a few short years ago, these far-left lawmakers were trying to abolish the agency while facilitating the invasion of criminal illegal aliens. 2018. AOC mentions Kamala Harris as a supporter of her radical agenda, which at the time included abolishing ICE. Now Kamala is promising to add more agents and secure the border. Kamala is not a leader. She is a grifter. pic.twitter.com/PjueAU9OPp â€” MAZE (@mazemoore) October 15, 2024 Meanwhile, the official X account of South Park made things even more viral. Wait, so we ARE relevant?#eatabagofdicks https://t.co/HeQSMU86Da â€” South Park (@SouthPark) August 5, 2025 One X user said, "When the government is funnier than you, time to retire." https://t.co/mcBs2o2w9Y pic.twitter.com/6xvWzdoK3Z â€” Jessica ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ (@RealJessica05) August 5, 2025 This all comes as anti-ICE attacks have skyrocketed by 830%, much of which has to do with Democrats and their dark-money billionaire-funded NGO network producing dangerous anti-ICE rhetoric. Read the latest report of an arson attack on an ICE building in Washington State. Tyler Durden Wed, 08/06/2025 - 14:25
